title: Cookie Policy
metaDescription: Learn how Anchor Point Advising uses cookies on our website for functionality and analytics.

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content:
This Cookie Policy explains how Anchor Point Advising ("we", "our", "us") uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

sections.heading: 2. What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit a website. They help websites function properly and improve user experience.

sections.heading: 3. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies for the following purposes:

subsections.heading: a) Essential Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without them, certain features may not work.

subsections.heading: b) Performance & Analytics Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often. This helps us improve our services and website performance.

subsections.heading: c) Functionality Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies remember your preferences (such as language settings) to enhance your experience.

sections.heading: 4. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data. These third parties may store cookies on your device in accordance with their own privacy policies.

sections.heading: 5. Managing or Rejecting Cookies
sections.content: You can choose to accept or reject cookies through:
sections.note: Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

sections.heading: 6. Data Protection
sections.content: Cookies used on our website do not collect sensitive personal data. Any information collected is used solely for improving website performance and user experience.

sections.heading: 7. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
